entries.name: cert_chain
entries.desc: The chain of certificates for signing including the signing certificate

entries.name: digest_algorithm
entries.desc: The digest algorithm used to create the signature

entries.name: key
entries.desc: The private key for the signing certificate

entries.name: new(key, cert_chain, passphrase = nil, options = {})
entries.desc: Creates a new signer with an RSA key or path to a key, and a certificate chain containing X509 certificates, encoding certificates or paths to certificates.

entries.name: re_sign_cert(expired_cert, expired_cert_path, private_key)
entries.desc: Attemps to re-sign an expired cert with a given private key

entries.name: sign(data)
entries.desc: Sign data with given digest algorithm
